content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1704328914317{padding-top: 30vh !important;padding-bottom: 20vh !important;background-image: url(https://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/AdobeStock_660905200.jpeg?id=7110) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay gradient-overlay”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Staffing Services

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1548113152764{padding-top: 120px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Next-generation staffing services to level up your business

 

All organizations, regardless of industry, can benefit from modern technology. But only when each and every employee understands how their role interacts with that technology can a business thrive, both today and into the future.

 

ATR was founded on this very principle, which we use to create dynamic staffing solutions for myriad industries:

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

  • Technology

  • Accounting & Finance

  • Insurance

  • Engineering

  • Professional

  • Healthcare/Hospital

  • Medical Device

  • Pharmaceutical

  • Biotech

  • Communications

  • Retail

  • Defense

  • Government

    • [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1549633236844{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    ATR has built its reputation on quality

    [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

    We set the tone for the entire staffing industry

     

    ATR is the very first quality-certified staffing firm in the U.S. As such, we understand that matching the right talent with the right role takes a personal touch—the kind of interaction that’s becoming increasingly rare in today’s world of work. That’s the mindset behind our proprietary recruiting process, which we’ve refined into a strategy that has benefitted countless businesses just like yours.

     

    [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

    ATR’s IT Staffing Solutions

    • Temporary Placement
    • Temp-to-Direct Placement
    • Direct Placement
    • Professional Payrolling
    • Managed Service Provider (MSP)

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”1400″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1549633236844{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    What separates ATR from the rest?

     

    [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7127″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

    We balance AI with a human touch

     

    Artificial intelligence is poised to change every industry it touches, but that doesn’t mean the end of human contact. At ATR, we recognize AI as a tool to be leveraged. We use it to scan top talent from across the nation. Once found, we connect with these individuals to learn whether they’re truly a fit for our dynamic clients. It’s a potent blend of new and old school methods, and it’s effectively future-proofed our processes.

     

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7128″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

    We recognize our veterans and their spouses

     

    Through our Military Commitment program, ATR honors the sacrifices of U.S. military veterans and their spouses by facilitating their reentry into the workforce. Recognizing the unique challenges they face, ATR offers tailored support, career counseling, and flexible job placements across America, including positions near military bases to ease relocation. This initiative celebrates the courage and dedication of our military families, providing the necessary assistance for a smooth transition to civilian working life. We feel it’s essential to ensure that professional growth and stability are within reach for those who have served and supported our nation.

     

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”7129″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

    We help you create an inclusive culture

     

    Ready to hire more diverse professionals but aren’t sure how? Let a certified Minority Business Enterprise like ATR show you the way to true inclusion. We’re a female-led, Hispanic-owned staffing firm that has helped thousands of minorities find roles in businesses where they can thrive. These efforts create rich environments for our clients where new ideas thrive and bright individuals are happy in their roles. And we cultivate diversity while making sure the professionals with the right skill sets fill your open roles.

     

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Looking for a trusted staffing partner? Look no further.



    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    Hiring Blogs

    Writing Better Job Descriptions: What Hiring Managers Can Learn from Job Seekers

    11.18.2020 | Best Practices, Hiring, Hiring Manager Blogs, Human Resources, IT staffing and recruiting

    People, whether a recruiter or a candidate, have one very important thing in common – they don’t want to waste their time. Yet neither can easily escape their fate. Recruiters are destined to review thousands of resumes and job seekers must plod through hundreds of job postings. Neither have time or patience for nonsense, yet […]

    Read the Article

    Why Your Hiring Strategy Should Include a Corporate Alumni Program

    06.06.2022 | Best Practices, Hiring, Hiring Manager Blogs

    In a tough hiring market, there is no such thing as a minor advantage—if it can give you an edge in finding top talent, it’s worth considering. It’s long been established that employee referral programs are a great addition to your overall recruitment strategy, but have you thought about starting a corporate alumni program? Almost […]

    Read the Article

    Why You Must Understand Your Company Culture

    06.06.2017 | Hiring, Retention

    I’ve worked in the staffing industry for almost 20 years. I’ve worked for firms of all sizes and even owned my own staffing firm. I’ve provided hundreds of companies with a wide range of talent, across dozens of industries. And even with all that experience, I don’t have all the answers when it comes to […]

    Read the Article

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1548209362006{background-image: url(http://www.atrinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/bigstock-Multiethnic-Diverse-Group-Of-C-255450298.jpg?id=1424) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”custom-overlay blue-gradient-overlay padding-bottom-70″][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”]

    Don't just take our word for it

  • ATR understands the high standards we require and their thorough screening process, large network, and experienced recruiters are able to consistently find the people we need.

     

    -ATR Client

  • When I need staffing services, I call ATR. They never fail to deliver results. They are reliable, professional, ethical, and know their business well.

     

    – ATR Client

  • We have found ATR to be a great business partner. They are professional, knowledgeable, honest, and hardworking. They demonstrate their commitment to quality and great client service every day in large and small ways. 

     

    -ATR Client

    • [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

    Organizations We’re A Part Of

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1501″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1513″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”1510″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_empty_space][vc_single_image image=”1500″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
